attributes.action: Make it a Criminal Offence for a UK MP to lie in office
attributes.background: In the best interests of the nation enough is enough. The EU Referendum was based on lies from both sides and you see it in and out of parliament on a daily basis. We the electorate deserve the truth from our elected members

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232305
